name: Create a review request
description:
**Note:** You can now use emoji in label names, add descriptions to labels, and search for labels in a repository. See the [blog post](/changes/2018-02-22-label-description-search-preview) for full details. To access these features and receive payloads with this data during the preview period, you must provide a custom [media type](/v3/media) in the `Accept` header:

    application/vnd.github.symmetra-preview+json
    

**Warning:** The API may change without advance notice during the preview period. Preview features are not supported for production use. If you experience any issues, contact [GitHub support](https://github.com/contact).

    POST /repos/:owner/:repo/pulls/:number/requested_reviewers
    

### [](#input)Input

Name

Type

Description

`reviewers`

`array` of `string`s

An array of user `login`s that will be requested.

`team_reviewers`

`array` of `string`s

An array of team `slug`s that will be requested.

### [](#example)Example

    {
      "reviewers": [
        "octocat",
        "hubot",
        "other_user"
      ],
      "team_reviewers": [
        "justice-league"
      ]
    }
    

### [](#response-if-user-is-not-a-collaborator)Response if user is not a collaborator

    Status: 422 Unprocessable Entity
    

### [](#response-1)Response

    Status: 201 Created

[](#delete-a-review-request)Delete a review request
---------------------------------------------------

    DELETE /repos/:owner/:repo/pulls/:number/requested_reviewers
    

### [](#input-1)Input

Name

Type

Description

`reviewers`

`array` of `string`s

An array of user `login`s that will be removed.

`team_reviewers`

`array` of `string`s

An array of team `slug`s that will be removed.

### [](#example-1)Example

    {
      "reviewers": [
        "octocat",
        "hubot",
        "other_user"
      ],
      "team_reviewers": [
        "justice-league"
      ]
    }
    

### [](#response-2)Response

    Status: 200 OK

params.name: reviewers
params.description: An array of user `login`s that will be requested.

params.name: team_reviewers
params.description: An array of team `slug`s that will be requested.

params.name: reviewers
params.description: An array of user `login`s that will be removed.

params.name: team_reviewers
params.description: An array of team `slug`s that will be removed.
